name: TERO - Terror Hour
description:
TERO is a casual horror game that utilizes Japanese folklore and popular stories from the region... experience the terror of the night as you watch a cursed film without permission.


Rating:

Show who the most skilled player is.



Hide if the mother enters the scene, you can watch when she's not around... but don't get caught watching in her presence.

  • Cover yourself with the blanket before she appears.

  • Try to stay alive for as long as possible.

  • Be careful with the bar, if it empties, you are exposed to death...



What can you expect?

  • Fear: Experience the surreal terror of being in a room watching a cursed film.

  • Stealth: Don't let her see you watching the film, hide when she's in the room.

  • Secrets: The game also contains many hidden secrets.

  • Competition: Endure the horror, and get your name on the leaderboard.

By Kanashi Studio
